name: Speedway Masters 2
description:
This game is a must have game for all the American Stock Cars Fans around the world.

The game brings 4 racing categories like:

* Open wheel racing cars
* Modern Stock Cars
* Old gen stock car
* Stock Truck car

In this game you'll can choose to race in Quick race mode and in Championship mode, also you can compete in various famous ovals circuits and road circuits.

Features:

4 racing categories;
Beautifull graphics;
Friendly gameplay;
Possibility to celebrate your wins making burnouts;

And much more!
